title: Aliens Found on Mars!
text: A viral post claims alien life was discovered on Mars. Experts deny any evidence.

title: Scientists Cure the Common Cold
text: Unverified reports say a small lab has cured the common cold using nanotech.

title: Local School Wins Robotics Competition
text: Students won first place at the regional robotics competition for autonomous drones.

title: Government to Ban Coffee
text: Rumors online claim the government plans to ban caffeine to improve productivity.

title: Community Garden Project Expands
text: Volunteers doubled garden space to supply food banks with fresh produce.

title: Man Claims He Time-Traveled to 3025
text: A mysterious video shows a man describing life in the year 3025 with proof.

title: Scientists Find Plastic-Eating Bacteria
text: A real breakthrough shows bacteria can degrade common plastics safely.

title: City Introduces Free Public Wi-Fi
text: Officials announce citywide Wi-Fi access to bridge the digital divide.

title: New Miracle Diet Promises 50lb Weight Loss
text: Clickbait articles claim an unproven fruit blend burns fat instantly.

title: Students Create App to Reduce Food Waste
text: College students build an app that connects leftover food to shelters.

title: Celebrity Adopts 20 Dogs in a Day
text: Social media erupts as a viral story claims a celebrity adopted 20 dogs overnight.

title: Rainfall Reaches Record Levels
text: Meteorologists confirm record rainfall in several coastal cities this week.

title: Moon Landing Was Filmed in a Studio
text: Conspiracy pages recycle old rumors about fake moon landings.

title: Doctors Develop Cancer Vaccine
text: A clinical trial shows promising early results in a universal cancer vaccine.

title: New Study: Chocolate Boosts Brain Power
text: Moderate chocolate intake may enhance cognitive function, study finds.

title: Massive UFO Seen Over New York
text: Hundreds of witnesses claim they saw strange lights hovering over Manhattan.

title: Library Hosts Coding Camp for Teens
text: Teens learn Python and web design at a week-long local coding camp.

text: A farmer sets a new record with a 2,000-pound pumpkin.

title: Government Replaces Cash with Digital Credits

title: Global Warming Is a Hoax, Claims Viral Post
text: A misleading viral thread denies climate change despite scientific consensus.
